function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High transmissibility of COVID-19","Impact":"Rapid spread of the virus and increased infection rates","Mitigation":"Strict containment measures, mass testing, and contact tracing","Technologies":"Digital health technology for tracking and monitoring","People":"General population","Owner":"Government health authorities"},{"Description":"Varied success in managing the burden of COVID-19","Impact":"Differences in infection rates and mortality among countries","Mitigation":"International collaboration and sharing of best practices","Technologies":"Data sharing platforms and collaborative digital tools","People":"Global public health organizations and governments","Owner":"Global public health organizations, governments"},{"Description":"Ineffective pandemic management despite preparedness","Impact":"Higher death rates in countries with supposedly better preparedness","Mitigation":"Implementation of effective digital health technologies for pandemic planning, surveillance, and response","Technologies":"Digital health technology for pandemic planning, surveillance, testing, and contact tracing","People":"General population","Owner":"Government health authorities"}]}
